name: Learning With Pibby: Hiding From Yourself
name_original: Learning With Pibby: Hiding From Yourself
description:
STORY:

Pibby is stuck at her homeland. No way to escape, however a clone of her hunts her down.. Survive for as long as you can!
Gameplay:
1. Endless gameplay
2. Horror aspects
3. Global Leaderboard

PRESS SPACE AND HOLD SPACE TO HIDE!
You aren't alone however
